mapper.sql: id, batch_no, feature_name, build_env, case_num, case_pass_num, case_fail_num, case_pass_rate, newly_fail_num, keep_failing_num, start_time, end_time, duration
mapper.select: select id, case_pass_rate as casePassRate, case_pass_num as casePassNum, case_fail_num as caseFailNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, case_pass_num as casePassNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, case_fail_num as caseFailNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, newly_fail_num as newlyFailNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7
select id, keep_failing_num as keepFailingNum from tb_dashboard order by batch_no desc limit 0,7

select
from tb_dashboard order by id desc limit 0,1

select tb_dashboard.batch_no, tb_dashboard.feature_name, tb_dashboard.build_env, tb_testcase.id, tb_testcase.story_name, tb_testcase.case_name, tb_testcase.case_owner, tb_testcase.case_step_num, tb_testcase.case_result, tb_testcase.newly_fail, tb_testcase.keep_failing, tb_testcase.start_time, tb_testcase.duration from tb_testcase, tb_dashboard where tb_testcase.batch_no = (select batch_no from tb_testcase order by id desc limit 0,1) and tb_dashboard.batch_no = tb_testcase.batch_no order by tb_testcase.id desc
select batch_no from tb_dashboard where batch_no like (date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%')) order by batch_no desc limit 0,1

select case_name as caseName, group_concat( case_result order by batch_no desc ) as historyResults from tb_testcase where case_name in ( select case_name from tb_testcase where batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and case_result = 0 ) group by case_name
mapper.insert: insert into tb_dashboard (id, batch_no, feature_name, build_env, case_num, case_pass_num, case_fail_num, case_pass_rate, newly_fail_num, keep_failing_num, start_time, end_time, duration) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{featureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildEnv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{casePassNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{casePassRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{newlyFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keepFailingNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into tb_dashboard
id,
batch_no,
feature_name,
build_env,
case_num,
case_pass_num,
case_fail_num,
case_pass_rate,
newly_fail_num,
keep_failing_num,
start_time,
end_time,
duration,

mapper.update:
update tb_dashboard
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feature_name = #{featureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
build_env = #{buildEnv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_num = #{caseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_pass_num = #{casePassNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_fail_num = #{caseFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_pass_rate = #{casePassRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
newly_fail_num = #{newlyFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
keep_failing_num = #{keepFailingNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_dashboard set batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feature_name = #{featureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_env = #{buildEnv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_num = #{caseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_pass_num = #{casePassNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_fail_num = #{caseFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_pass_rate = #{casePassRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, newly_fail_num = #{newlyFailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keep_failing_num = #{keepFailingNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
